New Records: James Harden moved into the 19th spot on the NBA's all-time three-point list, passing Kevin Garnett.
Key Match Events: James Harden finished the night with 22 points, 8 assists, 4 rebounds, and 2 steals.
The Clippers achieved their first three-game winning streak of the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers have been undefeated on the road this season, defeating the Golden State Warriors, Denver Nuggets, and Sacramento Kings.
Norman Powell has been averaging over 25 points a game on 50% shooting from the field in Kawhi Leonard's absence.
